mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ESTIMATE WHERE ( CASE #{dateSearchCondition} WHEN 'estimateDate' THEN TO_DATE(ESTIMATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN 'effectiveDate' THEN TO_DATE(EFFECTIVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ESTIMATE WHERE ESTIMATE_DATE =TO_DATE(#{estimateDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: Insert into ESTIMATE ( ESTIMATE_NO , CUSTOMER_CODE , ESTIMATE_DATE , CONTRACT_STATUS , ESTIMATE_REQUESTER , EFFECTIVE_DATE , PERSON_CODE_IN_CHARGE , DESCRIPTION) values ( #{estimateNo:VARCHAR} , #{customerCode:VARCHAR} , #{estimateDate:VARCHAR} , #{contractStatus:VARCHAR} , #{estimateRequester:NVARCHAR} , #{effectiveDate:VARCHAR} , #{personCodeInCharge:VARCHAR} , #{description:NVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ESTIMATE SET CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode:VARCHAR} , ESTIMATE_DATE = #{estimateDate:VARCHAR} , CONTRACT_STATUS = #{contractStatus:VARCHAR} , ESTIMATE_REQUESTER = #{estimateRequester:NVARCHAR} , EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{effectiveDate:VARCHAR} , PERSON_CODE_IN_CHARGE = #{personCodeInCharge:VARCHAR} , DESCRIPTION = #{description:NVARCHAR} WHERE ESTIMATE_NO = #{estimateNo}
